Articles.Content:
This is a general Christmas thread - you can post literally anything you want about Christmas.

I'm gonna start off by saying that I already got a computer (or rather will get; dad won't let me have it yet >.>) I didn't wish for a whole lot, mostly clothes and some League of Legends merch.

What did you guys wish for?

Merry Christmas all!

I took advantage of the sales to build my first new gaming PC since 2009. Got a bunch of cool toys for my kids that I'm going to have to test for them (one of the fringe benefits of being a parent ).
Heh. Looks like we all wanted computer(s) (& parts) this year.

I hope i get a 4gb stick of ram for my laptop this christmas.

Merry Christmas everyone!

(Dramatic trailer music here)

It's been too long. The laptops of old are struggling under the pressure of the modern era. One will ascend to the status of decent PC!

Dun duuun!

I'm getting a new PC

Meh, I'll stick to my laptop for now. I plan to get a cooling pad finally.

Also, I'm installing a 2nd monitor finally! Merry Christmas everybody!

i learned about frozen this christmast.....it was not pleasent

i got a elsa doll for my niece. it was the last one in stock

and merry christmast everyone and a happy new years.

Got a Mixtrack Pro II that arrived early ... Planning on buying a Moto 360 too if I get enough money ! If not, well, there's always Assin's Creed: Unity and/or The Crew waiting on my wishlists ^^

Merry Christmas everyone !

I'm also getting a new PC.

Weird?

A new PC? I wish! I'm getting a few books, including the new Diary of a Wimpy Kid (I am convinced that Jeff Kinney is enslaved ), a Lego set and some Steam cards. The family's what I care about, though.

Did anyone else get a real tree this year?
I think IO need to put a quad-core in my CPU to run ED/star citizen

A new PC? I wish! I'm getting a few books, including the new Diary of a Wimpy Kid (I am convinced that Jeff Kinney is enslaved ), a Lego set and some Steam cards. The family's what I care about, though.

Did anyone else get a real tree this year?

I'm with family over the holidays, and they have a real tree
This seems to be the appropriate place to leave this. Merry Christmas everyone!

Ugh! I can't wait anymore!

Anyways, merry Christmas, guys! Hopefully I'll get that awesome typhlosion plushie I've been begging for...

This seems to be the appropriate place to leave this. Merry Christmas everyone!

Thanks for that. Merry Christmas, Happy Holidays and Happy New Year!
Well, this is a surprise. My mom is giving me her old IPod! I'd say that's a nice present.

I got a saitek x52 pro! Yay!

Now I shall take over the world. With spaceships and jets.

Happy holidays to all of you

I got a cordless drill and assorted bits and drill heads. Already knew what I was getting beforehand, of course, but it's still nice Let the home improvement commence!

As for my gifts to others, it was mostly handmade stuff this year. Drawings, cookies, a decorative bowl made of coconut shells...

Happy holidays to all of you

I got a cordless drill and assorted bits and drill heads. Already knew what I was getting beforehand, of course, but it's still nice Let the home improvement commence!

As for my gifts to others, it was mostly handmade stuff this year. Drawings, cookies, a decorative bowl made of coconut shells...

Wait... If I take that drill, make holes in the cookies, connect them to the bowl and cover it in drawings...

I get a christmess.
*in* idem&same *out*

*in* idem&same *out*

Oooookay then...

Achtung! Sei gut! Krampus kommt!

I hope you were good this year . . for your sake.

Edited December 25, 2014 by segaprophet

I got some desktop drums, and a cue+ food.

...thats it...
I got two books: "Curiosity" by Rod Pyle and "You are Here" by Chris Hadfield. Oh, and a lump of coal...

I got a new weather station with a wireless sensor and lots of functions. It is now giving me readings about humidity, temperature and stuff.

Also a space pictures calendar, a book one drawing, a new boogie board, and some organisation stuff.

Also a bookmark/electronic dictionary, but that was a super late birthday present.

new Diary of a Wimpy Kid (I am convinced that Jeff Kinney is enslaved )

...

Did anyone else get a real tree this year?

They're still going? I haven't one for ages, is he out of highschool yet? Don't know if it's still the sort of thing I'd read.

Not a 'real' tree, but our Pinus Plasticocha has served us many many years, looks just as good, and lacks any risk of setting of a friend's allergies. It's quite realistic, even drops pine needles....

Edited December 25, 2014 by Tw1
